function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of piloting mobility pattern changes","Impact":"Unanticipated negative consequences from scaled-up changes in mobility patterns","Mitigation":"Conducting pilot projects to test initiatives before scaling up","Technologies":"Mobility tracking and analysis tools, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Citizens, city residents, visitors","Owner":"City management, inter-agency organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of networking among park managers","Impact":"Missed opportunities to learn from others and improve park management","Mitigation":"Facilitate networking and knowledge sharing among park managers","Technologies":"Networking platforms, data sharing and collaboration tools","People":"Park managers, city residents, park visitors","Owner":"Park management organizations, city authorities"},{"Description":"Underutilization of smart city resources","Impact":"Missed opportunities to improve city management and public access to resources","Mitigation":"Implementing smart city resources and technology to enhance city management","Technologies":"Smart city platforms, reporting and information apps, data analysis tools","People":"City managers, city residents, park visitors","Owner":"City authorities, smart city technology providers"}]}
